result.name: nematode-assemblages-from-field-samlping-and-lab-based-deposition-experiments-from-the-cre-1998
result.notes:
Data consists of presense data of nematode worms in the form of count data. 
Bulk sediment samples were collected from the Creeksea estuary (south east 
coast of the UK) in October 1998. The csv file entitled 
"nematodes_creeksea_field_samples_1998" contains data from these 
field-collected sediments, while while the csv entitled 
"nematodes_lab_experiemnts_creeksea_1998" contains data from experimental 
treatments sumulating the deposition of dredged material. Please see the Read 
Me file for a description of the contions within the laboratory experimental 
microcosms.

Data detailing sediment granulometry and trace metal concentrations of the 
bulk sediment is also available.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.

result.title: Nematode assemblages from field-samlping and lab based deposition experiments from the Creeksea estuary, October 1998

resources.description: The Cefas Data Portal contains metadata records and data sets available to download and connect to in support of our commitment to open science. Data is available in the following formats: Binary download, CSV, ESRI Shapefile. The data can also be accessed via the WFS and WMS protocols.
resources.name: Cefas Data Portal
